titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the convocation of the clergy in Ireland at the Cathedral Church of S. Patricks in Dublin, May 9, anno 1661, at the time of their general receiving the H. Communion / by Tho. Hacket.
titleStmt.author: Hackett, Thomas, d. 1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D. Maxwell for Tho. Davies and Th. Sadler ,
